result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Raheim L Davis

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Raheim L Davis appeared by video.  Attorney Maryann Corea appeared by video for Raheim L Davis.  Prosecuting attorney Gregg Herman appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Pretrial conference held. Defense needs to schedule a TAD evaluation. Case is adjourned in Branch 30.
Status conference scheduled for December 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Raheim L Davis in court. Student Intern Madeline Witte under the supervision of Prosecuting attorney Thomas L. Potter in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Defendant IS Public Defender eligible. Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  
The case is adjourned to Br. 30 for a Pretrial Conference.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 2, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Raheim L Davis
Current: 911 N 24th St., Milwaukee, WI 53233 United States  (Effective: 09-23-2022)
Prior: 3527 North 56th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53216
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 10/14/22 @ 2p
